models.bot

tasks

package tasks

Visibility
  1. Public
  2. All

Type Members

  1. class FacialAnalysisTask extends TaskActor

    This task performs a facial analysis by extracting faces from user's images, transforming pixels into a matrix, and merging with models.

  2. class FacialCheckTask extends TaskActor

    Task determines whether facial analysis is needed on a per-user basis.

  3. class MessageAnalysisTask extends TaskActor

    Task that creates messages based on criteria of conversation.

  4. class MessageReplyTask extends TaskActor

    This task is specifically meant for opening conversations with zero messages.

  5. class RecommendationsTask extends TaskActor

    Worker task that processes recommendations.

  6. class SwipeTask extends TaskActor

    Worker task that processes recommendations.

  7. trait TaskActor extends Actor

    Template for creating tasks.

  1. package message

  2. package recommendation
